com.listeners

Class UserSessionListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.listeners.UserSessionListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, javax.servlet.http.HttpSessionListener

    @WebListener
public class UserSessionListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.servlet.http.HttpSessionListener
    Application Lifecycle Listener implementation class UserSessionListener TODO: - Remember that after taking a quiz, we create a "Quiz.result" object to display on the account. We set a result attribute to the session variable. THIS NEEDS TO BE CLEARED when the hits "finalize", so that users visiting/refreshing the page don't see an old results page.
